author: Ubisoft
description:
We pulled 3 of our favorite facts from the latest episode of Echoes of History. Watch the full episode 👉 https://youtu.be/flC5QrKjvN8
Then tell us: which fact made your jaw drop? 👇
title: 3 Facts That Made Us Say “Wait… WHAT?”

author: Ubisoft
description:
Meet Schism – the 6th faction in Olden Era.
The long-awaited 6th faction has arrived, introducing fresh gameplay mechanics and new strategic possibilities.
With its focus on unavoidable damage and ability control, Schism adds a unique twist to the battlefield.
Explore the world of Jadame and experience this exciting new addition!
 
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/31...

Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era is the new installment in the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games.

Olden Era returns to the world of Enroth and the origins of the legendary saga, inviting both veterans and new players to go on a new strategic quest on Jadame, a mysterious continent in turmoil, mentioned but never explored in the previous games, with its unique factions, biomes and creatures.

Traverse a vibrant and living fantasy world full of wonders and dangers, build magnificent castles, raise massive armies and clash in epic and highly tactical battles of
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era - Schism Faction Reveal
